channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Solid Rule For Trump Admin 2.0: Ignore Whatever The Media Are Mad About!

item.title: The Trump Team 2.0
item.description: This time, it’s different — probably in large part due to Susie Wiles.

item.title: John Thune’s Opportunity
item.description: The new Republican leader can get a lot accomplished, but it won’t be an easy task.

item.title: What Trump Should Do If the Dockworkers Go Back on Strike
item.description: He should be prepared to stand up to an arrogant union that he’s previously supported, just as Reagan did.

item.title: Pete Hegseth Is The Perfect Candidate To Gut The Pentagon’s Bureaucratic Rot
item.description: Hegseth's outsider status makes him a threat to the bureaucratic rot infecting the highest levels of the Pentagon.

item.title: CNN Will Conduct Mass Firing As Rampant Lies Fuel Ratings Plummet
